Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Discovery Holiday Parks - Byron Bay in Byron Bay, you'll be on a river and close to Wategos Beach and Tyagarah Nature Reserve. This caravan park/campground is within close proximity of Cape Byron Lighthouse and Byron Bay Golf Course.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and an outdoor tennis court. This caravan park/campground also features complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Discovery Holiday Parks - Byron Bay.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Discovery Holiday Parks - Byron Bay.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wategos Beach - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Byron Bay Golf Course - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Tallow Beach - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Kings Beach - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 16 km / 9.9 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 16.4 km / 10.2 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 24 km / 14.9 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 24 km / 14.9 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 24.8 km / 15.4 mi
Shelly Beach - 25.1 km / 15.6 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 25.8 km / 16 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 26.4 km / 16.4 mi

The preferred airport for Discovery Holiday Parks - Byron Bay is Ballina, NSW (BNK-Ballina - Byron Gateway) - 22.5 km / 14 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
